attributes.action: Ban sale of products in the UK produced by child, slave or bonded labour
attributes.additional_details:
Make it illegal for any retailer, distributor or wholesaler to sell any product where it has been proven that said product has been produced by child, slave or bonded labour in any country of the world.
This would not only send a powerful signal to those companies importing such products but also reduce the viability of such businesses abroad that employ such labour.
